title: How to Make a Water Flower from a Plastic Bag and Straw

steps.headline: Cut the handles off a plastic bag.
Cut the bag open and flatten it out.
Fold and cut the bag as follows:
steps.description:

"} Make a fringe with many thin slits, the same length as the radius of the flower.

steps.headline: Color the bottom half of the slits.
Tie using a fishing line.
steps.description: Make sure you leave a good length of fishing line attached to the flower. You'll need it later.

steps.headline: Cut a piece of a plastic straw as shown in the pictures.
Pull the flower you made earlier through the straw.
steps.description: Pull it by the fishing line.

text:
Cut the handles off a plastic bag. Cut the bag open and flatten it out. Fold and cut the bag as follows: {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d4/Pbag2_43.JPG/460px-Pbag2_43.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/d/d4/Pbag2_43.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

"}Fold the bag into a rectangle, approximately 15 centimeter (5.9 in) x 30cm (6" x 12") in size. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7c/Pbag-fold_746.png/460px-Pbag-fold_746.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/7/7c/Pbag-fold_746.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":758,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1251.764705882353,"licensing":"

"}Fold the bag three more times and cut it lengthwise, adding an extra 2 centimeter (0.8 in) to the radius (and the size) of the flower you want to make. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5e/Pbag3_935.jpg/460px-Pbag3_935.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/5e/Pbag3_935.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":290,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":479.7683397683398,"licensing":"

"} Make a fringe with many thin slits, the same length as the radius of the flower. Open. Color the bottom half of the slits. Gather like an accordion. Tie using a fishing line. Make sure you leave a good length of fishing line attached to the flower. You'll need it later. Cut a piece of a plastic straw as shown in the pictures. Open like a star. Pull the flower you made earlier through the straw. Pull it by the fishing line. Attach a weight. Put it in the water.
